properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 1:28PM MST until February 16 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise ID
properties.description:
...SNOW WILL IMPACT TRAVEL IN THE MOUNTAINS THIS WEEKEND...

.A winter storm will bring snow to the mountains Saturday
afternoon through Sunday. Significant snow accumulations are
expected across higher elevations in Baker County, Oregon and the
Central Mountains in Idaho.

* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches
above 3500 feet, with 4 to 8 inches over the mountains.

* WHERE...Baker County zone.

* WHEN...From 10 AM Saturday to 10 AM PST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM SATURDAY TO 10 AM PST SUNDAY
